name: Circle P Capital
overview:
Circle P Capital is based in beautiful Boulder, Colorado in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains. Our investment philosophy is simple. We seek exceptional entrepreneurs, and through laser-focused assistance in strategy, sales, marketing, operations and accounting, we’ll accelerate the company’s growth significantly.

We’ve personally started and successfully existed from early-stage technology companies, so we’ve “walked a mile in your shoes”. It’s not an easy road, but one of the most fulfilling journeys of a lifetime.

If a company understands the value of hiring top-notch People, possesses an unquenchable Passion for their business idea, and realizes that unrelenting Persistence is an absolute necessity, then that company fits our principal profile.
